import g2plot from '@antv/g2plot';

const data = [
  { year: '1951 å¹´', sales: 38 },
  { year: '1952 å¹´', sales: 52 },
  { year: '1956 å¹´', sales: 61 },
  { year: '1957 å¹´', sales: 145 },
  { year: '1958 å¹´', sales: 48 },
];

const barPlot = new g2plot.Bar('c1', {
  data,
  xField: 'sales',
  yField: 'year',
  colorField: 'year',
});

barPlot.render();
